channel.title: Sign in :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Authenticate Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 24 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Simple guide hub with a summary paragraph and links to the various guides in the section. Describe authentication options available. Set up user journeys. Currently splitting authentication by functionality. We can either lead the split by functionality or by product.

item.title: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model
item.description: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 26 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: In phase 1, if “Setting up okta org policies” can be unified into one place for all (redirect and embedded) guides, we’ll have to add a specific set-up guide for redirect and each of the embedded models.

item.title: Use an alternate SDK-based sign-in solution
item.description: Add a more customizable sign-in solution Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 404 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Page type: Navigation Content type: Autogenerated Index An autogenerated index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering.

item.title: Add a direct sign-in experience for high trust scenarios
item.description: Add a sign-in experience directly with the Direct Authentication API Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes This section contains all the Direct Auth integration guides. Each version of the original guide has been pulled into its own guide in the new IA. This was done for several reasons: It improves search results from Google It makes tagging individual guides easier and makes it easier to discover the right version of the guide in both the navbar and via internal search.

item.title: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices
item.description: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 317 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Add a intro paragraph specifically stating what scenarios this implementation is used for. When would i use this scenario over direct auth?

item.title: Sign in with an external identity provider (IdP)
item.description: Sign in with an external identity provider (IdP) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 198 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: The first two sections of the source document are being used in Learn > OIDC > Identity Providers (ID: 784) so this doc starts at “How Okta connects to external IdPs” but requires a new introduction to this group of documents as a whole.
